game.name: Snake Puzzle Challenge
game.description:
We have a good news for all snake lovers. This brand new arcade game features a number of puzzles comprising the pictures of various commonly found snakes. Join this free online puzzle challenge and get ready to put your brain and memory power to test! A picture of a snake will be shown on the screen for a few seconds and then it will be shattered in several pieces. You have to connect all the pieces properly to complete the image of the snake and clear the level. 

Solving all the puzzles available in different 12 levels of the gamer will help to keep your brain sharp! Remember, each picture contains the puzzles that are divided into three modes â€“ Easy, Medium and Hard. There will be no time limit to complete the puzzle, so take your time before connecting them in the right direction. This one of the top HTML5 snake games is available for players from different age groups. You are sure to have the time that is full of fun and adventure. 

All these various jigsaw puzzles require to challenge your mind to create the result. No need to fear of these cute snakes since these slithering serpents are not scary, but very cute and beautiful. With small details and colourful scales, these lovely animals are enough to deliver outstanding images for puzzles. Feel free to hit the play button in case if you are looking forward to attempting something relaxing and funny! Check out our more memory and brain games in a search for some more entertaining!
